definition: healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: Here are five steps you can take to help your machines run much faster.
sentences.chinese: 以下是能让你的机器健步如飞起来的五个步骤。

sentences.english: Target moved Jianbu thoughts in my mind swiftly.
sentences.chinese: 瞄准感动，思绪在我脑中健步如飞。

sentences.english: Tom was a quick walker and soon got ahead of the others.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆是个健步如飞者，很快就走到其他人前面去了。

definition: as lithe as a swallow (of athlete or beautiful girl)
at a stride/taking large steps (while walking)
to walk unsteadily/to stagger/to lurch/to hobble/to totter
in glowing spirits (idiom); bursting with life/radiating health and vigor
to breathe heavily like an ox (idiom)/to huff and puff
spirit trembling with excitement (idiom); in high spirits/lively and full of enthusiasm/full of energy/con brio
lit. lively dragon and animated tiger (idiom)/fig. vigorous and lively
